name: AWS Cloud Solutions Architect
description: Learned about core AWS services and concepts including EC2, S3, RDS, and VPC through hands-on labs and projects. Learned to design scalable, highly available, cost-effective, and fault-tolerant architectures on AWS cloud infrastructure.

name: Deep Learning Specialization
description: Built standard, convolutional, and recurrent neural networks through TensorFlow and Keras and applied them to tasks ranging from object detection to natural language processing (NLP). Delved further into NLP concepts such as wording embeddings, tokenization, and transformer models.

name: CS50
description: Learned about foundational computer science concepts, including algorithms, data structures, and programming languages like C, Python, and SQL. Gained proficiency in creating web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Flask.
